Title: Holiday Advent Calendar 2018
Description: ['Asami Ike made a Christmas Advent animation, each day was a new short animation counting down to Christmas. She posted each ep on her official Twitter page. 17 total pieces were made but advent day 12-15 used entirely live-action footage and as such are not included in the episode count. A compilation of the whole advent was posted to her official YouTube channel.']
Related: ['Prequel: Hong Mao Lan Tu: Ni Wen Wo Da', 'Sequel: Hong Mao Lan Tu: Xiao Youmo']
